analyzed: gcig tu mnyam bzhag 'grub 'gyur ba'i/_/gnas bzang po ni nges par rtag_/

analyzed: nas/_/mchod nas rang gi lus la bzhug_/rnal 'byor che mchog rang gi lus//

analyzed: bzhin can ma ser/_/las kyi phyag rgya'o/_/snying khar brgyad kyi cha rnams la/_/

analyzed: kun gyi dbang skur gnas su ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' zla ba'i mdog_/shes

translated: Padmāntaka is at the anus, and Vighnāntaka in the secret place.🔽Acala is in the right shoulder, and Trailokyavijaya in the left.🔽Nīlāmbaradhara is in the right hip, and Mahābala in the left.

translated: The method of the four seals🔽is in the two eyes.🔽The seal of phenomena

analyzed: rgod pa g.yer kha can/_/rna ba gnyis la gnas pa'o/_/chos kyi phyag rgya'o/_/
translated: is in the two ears.🔽The great wind is in the soles of the feet,

analyzed: rkang pa'i 'thil du rlung chen po/_/sum mdor me de lto ba chu/_/brang ni sa ru

translated: The Means of Accomplishment of the Four Mudras🔽The master of yoga, the great hero, the glorious Virupa, who is victorious over the enemy, the afflictions, has said: I do not abide in the non-abiding,

analyzed: bzhi yi lam/_/lte /yang dag sbyor las byung bzhin phye ba'i mthus/_/'gro ba lhan
